plot outline: This new film presents a light comedy on some amazing political moves in a simplest possible ways. The film's screenplay does not spare the ruling party as well as opposition party, presenting their gimmicks to remain in limelight, while pulling each other's legs. In short, all the politicians will be target in this film. And the makers of this film are confident that their film would offer total entertain to the Marathi audience .
title: Gaon Thor Pudhari Chor
plot: This new film presents a light comedy on some amazing political moves in a simplest possible ways. The film's screenplay does not spare the ruling party as well as opposition party, presenting their gimmicks to remain in limelight, while pulling each other's legs. In short, all the politicians will be target in this film. And the makers of this film are confident that their film would offer total entertain to the Marathi audience .::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni

Chandrakanth Mane (CM) and his right hand Narba nominate Parvatibai Teltumbde for upcoming election and by fluke she wins it.Chandrakanth and Narba also get elected as leaders.But there are opposed by opposition Ghodegaonkar.When More Master enters the village and stands against the corrupt politics and enrolls for the candidate of CM.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
